sentences.en: "It's been a lovely day," she said, dismissing the episode.
sentences.cn: “这是开心的一天，”她说，将那事抛到了脑后。

sentences.en: "She has given them this seven hundred pounds."— 'What a lovely thought.'
sentences.cn: “她给了他们这700英镑。”——“太慷慨了。”

sentences.en: "Such lovely clothes. I'd no idea Milan was so wonderful," she raved.
sentences.cn: “这些时装太漂亮了。我没想到米兰是如此的精彩，”她赞不绝口。

sentences.en: Darling how lovely to see you, you look simply divine.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的，见到你太让人高兴了，你看上去简直美极了。

sentences.en: Darling! It's lovely to see you.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的！见到你真是太好了。

sentences.en: fish and chips and a few beers on the way back from a match—lovely jubbly!.
sentences.cn: 在看完比赛回去的路上来点鱼和炸土豆条，再来几杯啤酒——太棒了！。

sentences.en: He is a lovely boy, very gentle and caring.
sentences.cn: 他是个可爱的男孩，非常温柔体贴。

sentences.en: He was a lovely little boy.
sentences.cn: 他是个可爱的小男孩。

sentences.en: I shall use the money to make my home look lovely.
sentences.cn: 我要用这笔钱把家里搞得漂漂亮亮的。

sentences.en: I shouldn't grumble about Mum — she's lovely really.
sentences.cn: 我不该抱怨妈妈——她真的很好。

sentences.en: She had a lovely face.
sentences.cn: 她有一张漂亮的脸蛋。

sentences.en: She's a lovely child.
sentences.cn: 她是个心地善良的孩子。

sentences.en: She's got a lovely way with language without ever sounding ostentatious.
sentences.cn: 她的语言优美，丝毫无装腔作势之感。

sentences.en: Single room in lovely flat, roof terrace, non-smoking prof., woman pref.
sentences.cn: 舒适公寓中的单间，带屋顶阳台，不抽烟的职业人士，女士优先。

sentences.en: Thank you for a lovely evening.
sentences.cn: 谢谢你让我们度过了一个美好的夜晚。

sentences.en: The house is in a lovely setting in the Malvern hills.
sentences.cn: 房子坐落在莫尔文丘陵地区，周围景色迷人。

sentences.en: The room was so lovely it seemed churlish to argue.
sentences.cn: 房间太漂亮了，要是再争辩的话就会显得很无礼。

sentences.en: They were both lovely, friendly people.
sentences.cn: 他们俩都很和善友好。

sentences.en: This oil has a lovely woody fragrance.
sentences.cn: 这种精油散发着怡人的木香。

sentences.en: What a lovely day!
sentences.cn: 多好的天气啊！

sentences.en: What a lovely house!
sentences.cn: 多么漂亮的房子啊！

sentences.en: You look lovely in that dress.
sentences.cn: 你穿那条连衣裙很漂亮。
